choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews

### Response:


Here is your meal plan for the week that meets all of your dietary restrictions:
Monday - Grilled chicken with roasted vegetables and quinoa. 
Tuesday - Brown rice stir fry with tofu, broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers. 
Wednesday - Black bean burger on a bed of spinach with sweet potato wedges. 
Thursday - Grilled salmon with roasted Brussels sprouts and cauliflower mash. 
Friday - Veggie pizza with a gluten-free crust, topped with tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, olives, and spinach. 
Saturday - Omelette filled with spinach, tomatoes, and avocado served with roasted sweet potato wedges. 
Sunday - Chickpea curry over brown rice with steamed broccoli.
